abstract: Texas Court of Criminal Appeals issues reprieve to Garcia White, who was linked to five killings, but does not immediately explain decision.
lead_paragraph: The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals called off Wednesday’s execution of a man linked to five killings, though lawyers said the court did not immediately explain its decision.
snippet: The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals called off Wednesday’s execution of a man linked to five killings, though lawyers said the court did not immediately explain its decision.
